I am Diana

Junior Full stack web developer

View my work

Are you looking for a junior web developer with a passion for coding and a love for crafting innovative solutions? Look no further!

Coding Enthusiast

A junior web developer with a deep passion for coding and a strong desire to create captivating online experiences.

Versatile Skill Set

HTML, CSS, Ruby, PHP, Wordpress and JavaScript, with experience in frameworks like Rails and React, enabling the development of dynamic and responsive web applications.

Collaborative Team Player:

Thrives in collaborative environments, actively contributing ideas and embracing opportunities to learn from experienced developers.

Commitment to Quality

Prioritizes clean code, maintains efficient workflows, and strives for optimal user experiences, ensuring high-quality web solutions.

My creative Process

All my projects start with a concept. I work closely with my clients to understand their needs and goals. I then create a wireframe and a design for the project. After the design is approved, I start coding the project.

1

Concepting

I am enthusiastic about the concepting phase and utilize tools like Figma to create engaging user experiences. By employing techniques such as creating personas, defining core user journeys, and mapping user flows and wireframes, I contribute to laying a solid foundation for the success of each project.

2

Backend

I am familiar with technologies such as Ruby on Rails and Node.js. I am eager to expand my knowledge in these areas and utilize them to create efficient and scalable web applications. Additionally, I am gaining experience in working with databases like MySQL and SQLite to effectively manage data.

3

Frontend Design

I specialize in front-end development, where I have a strong grasp of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. With a focus on responsive design principles, I strive to create visually appealing and interactive web interfaces that aim to deliver an exceptional user experience across various devices.

4

Deployment

I have learned different deployment techniques using platforms like Heroku and Netlify, as well as DNS management. Additionally, I am exploring tools like Hotjar to analyze user behavior and optimize the deployed applications for a better user experience.
